website_summaries.verdict: Amazing liquid alternative for kids who won't take chewables, gummies, or pills.
pros: Orange-flavored liquid can be mixed with juice or milk for picky eaters

customer_reviews.title: " It does have a pretty strong "vitamin" taste
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old daughter who is autistic. It has really seemed to help her "stay regular." It does have a pretty strong "vitamin" taste, but it's vitamins so........ And we don't have any trouble getting her to take it. Would definitely recommend for anyone with autistic children who can't take pills or chewables.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Morris

customer_reviews.title: Why do you put Xylitol in a children's vitamin
customer_reviews.text: It has Xylitol in it which is a fake sugar and bothers some people's digestive systems. I was disappointed to see it had that in it. As an adult whose digestive system is compromised with gastroparesis I have to take liquid children's vitamins. All fake sugars are out for people like me. I can't imagine giving Xylitol to a child as well. Not good for the digestive tract. Therefore, I've wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Needs methylfolate!
customer_reviews.text: Kid hated taste but eh, we coaxed him anyhow. Bad news is this uses folic acid instead of methylfolate........if you have the MTHFR gene like my family this isn’t good. If you don’t know about MTHFR genes google it. It’s a great product if you’re an expert on getting your kids to take them and you don’t carry the MTHFR gene. 😝
customer_reviews.author: Darling Harlet

customer_reviews.title: Overheated
customer_reviews.text: The vitamin was fine. It was the packaging that was the problem. I understand people cant spend a million dollars a year on cooling a warehouse but at least keep the temps from getting above 110°. The outer safety shrink wrap was so dried out that it disintegrated when I removed it. That tells me it was in extreme heat for a long time. Plastics are not meant to be boiled as they excrete toxicity into the product. I wont be ordering from here again.
customer_reviews.author: anthony l rachelli

customer_reviews.title: Special needs savior
customer_reviews.text: My daughter with autism (and CP) is a very picky eater. I mix this with apple or grape juice and she drinks it down no problem!! I just have to trust that all the vitamins listed are really in there! FYI vitamin supplements aren't scrutinized in the US like drugs are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my child with autism and Alopecia
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a good quality multi vitamin for my son who will not eat gummies or anything that prompts chewing. My son is on the autism spectrum and has alopecia. It was important to find a multivitamin with essential vitamins because of his sensory sensitivities that limit his diet and that had a biotin/folic avid because of his Alopecia. Maybe it’s just wishful thinking, however, I have noticed new hair growth and his overall speech and behavior has progressed. I cannot say it is due only to this product, but I sure think it helps in addition to his therapies =)
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Seven-year-old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: When we took our son to the dentist, the dentist recommended that we use liquid vitamins rather than chewables or gummies because the chewables and gummies usually contain sugar and the texture gets stuck in kids' teeth. I've searched high and low for an affordable liquid vitamin and finally settled on this one because the price seemed fair for the ingredients listed. My son loves the flavor. He says it's like drinking (a shot of) orange juice every morning. We are satisfied and will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Rascon

customer_reviews.title: Great product-poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product and my picky son gives me no trouble taking this great tasting liquid vitamin (Tastes similar to orange juice) BUT the packaging needs work. Both times I've received this it was leaking a bit. There were no obvious defects but the aluminum seal under the cap isn't completely air tight. This leads to a sticky wet bottle after being jostled around during shipment. I'd like to see amazon discuss this with the seller so that maybe they come up with a better packaging system. At the very least, please place it in a seperate bag to avoid cross contamination with other items shipped at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Horner

customer_reviews.title: Easy to give to my child
customer_reviews.text: We just started this vitamin a week ago for my 4 yr old who doesnt eat right and want to make sure hes getting all the vitamins he needs to keep him healthy. We saw the reviews on here and all were so good and alao for their kids that didnt like taking vitamins in pill form that was easy to give to their kids in their drinks so thats what we have been doing to get his vitamins in we put in his drinks so he doesn't even notice it. Why i wanted liquid form since he will not chew a pill so i was so hapy when we found this vitamin andim so happy with this!!! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA S HOFFMAN

customer_reviews.title: ... tube fed child and it is hard to find good liquid vits so this stuff is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I have a tube fed child and it is hard to find good liquid vits so this stuff is awesome. I really see a difference in his behavior also.
customer_reviews.author: DD Drumm

customer_reviews.title: Artificially sweet!
customer_reviews.text: Disgusting. Bought this due to high reviews but this is incredibly artificially flavored with excessive sugar/xylitol. Opened it and tasted it before giving to my kids - threw away immediately and bought a more natural product with no sugar added.
customer_reviews.author: Glorytohim

customer_reviews.title: Very picky kid drinks it! Only 1 problem.
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old ASD boy drinks it down in 1 big gulp, so it is worth the annoyance that it leaks terribly. You need to shake it before you pour it into the cup. When you shake it the liquid gets trapped somewhere in the cap so when you take the cap off it comes pouring down the side of the bottle. Makes a mess everywhere and wastes the product. I put it in a different container, but it is really a pain
customer_reviews.author: Kessler Az

customer_reviews.title: My picky eaters approve
customer_reviews.text: I have two kids and have struggled to find a multi vitamin that they both enjoy. This is the first to pass their rigorous taste tests. I appreciate that the liquid is more easily absorbed into their bodies; that makes sense to me. I also really value that this product says it's made in the USA. I don't rely on it for their nutritional needs, that being said, it is comforting to know that they've got some back up for those extra picky days <3 To sum up: My kids give this vitamin four big thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Han and Leia Solo

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement for picky eater
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this liquid vitamin. We have a four year old autistic son with a very picky pallet, and he tolerates this product just fine. That said, we do mix it in his orange juice smoothie, but he hasn't detected it. This is a great supplement for him as he doesn't eat hardly any fruits or veggies. Don't forget to refrigerate it to preserve the taste. We were very happy to find this product as our local stores no longer carry a liquid form of vitamins for children. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: My son has sensory processing disorder and is extremely picky about what he eats. Even rice makes him throw up. But he LOVE LOVE LOOOOVES taking his vitamins! They do help with his overall mood as well. The poor minion has ADHD, anxiety, possibly autism, and a few behavioral problems. My only disappointment is that I was expecting some fruits and veggies in the blend since it boasts about "Superfoods". I was wanting to help supplement his nutrition during this cursed pandemic. That's the only reason it got 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Hunter

customer_reviews.title: For kids that won't take pills or gummies this is a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: My son has autism and has a very poor diet and was experiencing a problem with the white party of his eye having a snap paper like texture. After blood tests, the doctors realized that he was severely deficient in vitamin A. I immediately had to look for a liquid because he won't take pill (remember that pesky autism) and found this multi vitamin. After a week there was significant improvement and his eye healed and he's been taking it ever since! I hope it's always available because it saved his eyesight! Update, I'm taking one star back because the price of this item keeps going up! Huge difference from when I first started buying it
customer_reviews.author: Z. Tennent

customer_reviews.title: Still better than chewables
customer_reviews.text: It definitely has the vitamin smell. Taste is just ok but my toddler had no issues taking it as a supplement when he went through a 2.5 month phase of not eating, just drinking fluids. Still quicker to get through the taste than chewables that sit in your mouth longer. I was very happy to find this product and it helped give me peace of mind that my child was still receiving important vitamins he needed.
customer_reviews.author: Christine S

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: I've been ordering this for my son for approximately the past year. He is on the autism spectrum and this is the only vitamin that I have been able to get him to take. He likes the taste (though it did take a little while for him to get used to it since he is very picky). He takes this every night before brushing his teeth before bed. I feel that his behavior has improved and it gives me some peace of mind that he is receiving most of the vitamins he is lacking since he has extreme food restrictive behavior.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin C

customer_reviews.title: Good liquid vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I get this for my 6 year old daughter, who is disabled. She can't tolerate chewables, so liquid vitamins are necessary for us. We put a serving in her juice up and she drinks it, no problem. The smell and taste is like liquefied chewable vitamins, so not unexpected. It is quite thick, so we don't give it to her as is, just because the flavor is tart. We've bought this product multiple times and plan to continue buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Nadai

customer_reviews.title: Good taste
customer_reviews.text: A lot of people said that this helped their child gain weight. This did not help my sons appetite. My son is a very picky eater and I was hoping that I could find a multivitamin that would also increase his appetite a little bit. I have not noticed a change but I do like that it tastes like mango. It does not taste like vitamins. I usually mix this in a fruit drink or give it to him straight. He actually asks for it as an actual drink but obviously I can't do that.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: This liquid vitamin is pretty good. My son looks forward to taking it and will remind me to give it to him. It is a thinner consistency resembling juice form. Which makes it easier for kids to swallow verses liquid vitamins that come with a thicker consistency. It’s was a hit in my house. Definitely recommend this vitamin.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a vitamin for my kid.
customer_reviews.text: Searched for a good vitamin my daughter would take. If your kid doesn't like the nasty gummy vitamin this is the one for you. The flavor is good and my daughter doesn't fight me anymore to take her vitamin.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Simon

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately my kids (ages 4 and 6)  didn't like the taste
customer_reviews.text: This is the first liquid vitamin they have tasted. It's an orange flavor. It really doesn't taste bad at all, just a little strong/sour. I have diluted it in a little bit of water so it looks more like orange juice but they just couldn't... I really need to find a Xylitol gummy for them. So, I'm the one drinking this stuff. I wish they liked it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Blue Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamin for my littles
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don’t like is that it is sweetened with xylitol. While it is better than sucralose etc, I wish there was a different way to sweeten it. 100% of everything when the kids liquid vitamin at the vitamin shoppe was not! I usually buy from the tropical oasis website because of the sales/deals but I think this vitamin works great. The flu has been around both of my kids’ classes and it bypassed them (we don’t do the shot either).
customer_reviews.author: S. N.

customer_reviews.title: My 5yr old with ASD loves it
customer_reviews.text: we administer the vitamin to my daughter with an oral syringe, the type used for other medications. She is always happy to take her vitamins everyday. She has a poor diet so this helps us feel better about getting some of the missing nutrients in her diet. We have used this product for about 8mths and we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for picky eaters!
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for a decent kid's multivitamin for a while...something other than gummies. Chewables are hit and miss with my picky kids. I found this and had to try it. I give it to my 3 and 5 year old in a little cup mixed with their homemade elderberry syrup. Orange juice would work too or just straight up. Make sure to give it after a meal because some of the vitamins are fat soluble. Great option for picky eaters, and liquid vitamins are supposed to be better absorbed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong flavor
customer_reviews.text: Having a child on the spectrum makes it difficult to get proper vitamins and nutrients in them with food aversions so I tried to find a liquid multivitamin I could hide in juice, not even close. The flavor is sp incredibly strong, I got some on my finger and licked it off, my tongue got tingly and numb. Maybe someone else would like the flavor but we did not.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Perrigo

customer_reviews.title: Great for picky consumers!
customer_reviews.text: My son is super picky. He was diagnosed with autism and I always had a hard time finding vitamins for him to consume. I was worried that he wasn’t receiving the proper nutrition because of his picky eating but this has changed that for him. He loves this product so much and even request to have more. He looks forward to taking his next dose the following day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 9 year old FINALLY takes a multivitamin!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old daughter tried and does not like the chewable or gummy multivitamins out there on the market. I came across this product while searching on Amazon. Thank you Tropical Oasis! My daughter now takes a multivitamin each morning! She drinks it out of one of those small cups that comes with children's cold medicines that measures one tablespoon. The taste took a little getting used to; she would chase it with orange juice. But now, there is no chaser. My only dislike is the price: it is a little high for a multivitamin that lasts about 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Mr V

customer_reviews.title: my kid doesn't like it, but I think it's delicious
customer_reviews.text: It tastes like sweetened orange juice. I have read (in other places than just this product) that liquid vitamins have a much bette absorption rate than pills or gelcaps, so that's cool. I can't get my kid to eat even the gummy vitamins, so liquid is a great alternative for me. It does have to be refrigerated after opening, and says that it only lasts for 30 days, but taking the recommended dose once a day seems like it will use it up right on time.
customer_reviews.author: Coty C.

customer_reviews.title: Only way we can get our son to take vitamins
customer_reviews.text: Our son won't swallow pills and refuses gummy vitamins so this was the only way, outside pediatric shakes, that we could get vitamins into him. We just use a small medicine cup and pour the vitamins with breakfast every morning and he drinks it. It's been a great solution for the past 1-2 years and we've read that liquid vitamins are absorbed much better anyway!
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Kids approved!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best kids multi-vitamin around! I have two kids and it had been very difficult and not to mention expensive to try and find vitamins that they will take without spitting it out or flushing it down the toilet. I have tried pretty much every single one out there and with both my kids being picky eaters I really needed to find something that made me feel better about their eating habits and knowing they were getting the vitamins they needed.I decided to give this one a try as a friend recommended it. Just one tbsp and mixed with orange juice...VOILA... they LOVE it!!! I highly highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Infante

customer_reviews.title: Son’s Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Of all the brands we tried, both liquid and chewable, this is his favorite. He has been using this for a year or two and he is four years old. We give a chewable iron supplement in the evenings as that is the only thing this is missing. It’s best to take iron separately though, so we don’t mind.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Taste isn't good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this liquid vitamin for my 5 year old grandson with autism I put it in his chocolate milk and he still tastes it and refuses to drink it I even cut the dose in 1/4 I'm sure it isn't the vitamin itself but I just wanted to put up this review he is a very picky eater so its back to research to find something
customer_reviews.author: T.Mc

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Kids Multivitamin
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a high quality liquid multi for my daughter who needs to supplement her diet of carbs and cucumbers. :) She loves this straight from the bottle or mixed into a bit of apple juice. The only bummer is that the plastic around the top sealing the product was flaking away when we received, not sure why this happened, but the product itself seems to be okay. Would love if it came in a glass bottle instead of plastic!
customer_reviews.author: MN Mama

customer_reviews.title: Finally a vitamin I can sneak into my picky kids!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 5 year old asd son and a 4 year old asd daughter. Mixing full strength vitamin with their drinks was a no go so I only poured 1/4 in their drink 4 times during the morning to cut down on such a strong taste. My son in particular is very picky and has mouth addversions and I'm able to sneak it in this way. My daughter isn't as picky but she turned it away full strength so I'm doing the same for her. Vitamins in general are icky so glad I found a liquid one that my children can tolerate.
customer_reviews.author: Laura K

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My son is a picky eater and drinker.. he doesn't like taking gummy vitamin or anything else. He doesn't eat fruits or vegetables. This multivitamin helped a lot and my son loves the taste. So far so good. I ordered 3 times already and going to order the 4th one. Really recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Telly D'Agostino

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter recently got braces so her normal gummy vitamins were out of the question per her orthodontist. She still struggles swallowing pills so I made it my mission to find a liquid children’s vitamin that didn’t taste medicinal. This product is it! She said it tastes like a watered down orange juice. I take the women’s liquid multi and it has a similar flavor. We will definitely be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Son Willingly Takes This
customer_reviews.text: My son has different allergies and had horrible reflux. He doesn't like chewable vitamins. He gladly takes this every day and without prompting one day said, "I think I don't have reactions like I used to because of my new medicine." I had been thinking the same thing! If I forget, he reminds me. He never did that with other vitamins!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: I was in need of a liquid multi for my two boys (8 and 6). Knowing gummies are terrible for the teeth we tried this one for the taste and superior quality of nutrition. Both my boys LOVE the vitamin- it's like a treat in our house when it's vitamin time! Liquid is very thin- sometimes a cup is better than a spoon. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Bad Taste
customer_reviews.text: No matter how much I diluted this with apple juice my 4 year old could still taste it and refused to drink it. I tried it and thought it was bearable when heavily diluted but there was no way my son was going to drink this.
customer_reviews.author: SapphireMoon

customer_reviews.title: The best by far
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this flavor and has made a huge difference. Love the flavor. Have tried many here in the market but this tops it.
customer_reviews.author: ABBAS

customer_reviews.title: Good vitamins
customer_reviews.text: It took my son about a week to accept this vitamin, but now he looks forward to it each day. My son is one of the pickiest eaters around, to include not eating gummy vitamins. So this vitamin is a comfort knowing he’s getting everything he needs.
customer_reviews.author: KEG

customer_reviews.title: Kids think it tastes great, easy was to provide kids with 100% of the daily recommended vitamins.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a high quality multivitamin for our children, and have been disappointed with the fact that many other vitamins I have found do not come close to the daily amount of vitamins each serving provides, but this provides 100% of many important vitamins. My kids love to take this and have never complained about the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Megan S.

customer_reviews.title: She likes the flavor
customer_reviews.text: My child will drink this without any struggle. I have not had any troubles with leaks. The color seemed a bit darker in this last bottle. I keep it in my fridge for preservation and flavor. I am not sure if it helps her. I haven't seen any improvement to her health but then again I don't see any improvement with other vitamins either. All in all seems to be a good product.
customer_reviews.author: TLS333

customer_reviews.title: Vitamin was bad
customer_reviews.text: This was our third bottle and it was rotten, the expiration date was still good but I think it had to be stored in a different way. I usually try things first before I give it to my child , this bottle had a terrible smell, you don’t even need to taste...
customer_reviews.author: Mariposa

customer_reviews.title: Picky child taking vitamins
customer_reviews.text: We are on day 4 of our new multi vitamin. I have a very picky child who won’t eat chewable vitamins or gummy. She isn’t a huge fan of the orange flavor but she’s is drinking it daily and that’s all that matters. I think it’s growing on her which makes me happy. Would love to see other flavor options in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Healthy Oiling Mama

customer_reviews.title: Vitamins are no longer a battle
customer_reviews.text: My son has major food aversions and we always worry about him getting the micronutrients he needs. Chewable and pill form vitamins are not something he will take. He easily swallows this and enjoys the taste. We now look forward to taking a daily vitamin.
customer_reviews.author: Dman13

customer_reviews.title: Smells like poop
customer_reviews.text: Tastes so awful that I could only get my 4 year old to choke it down (literally) once. I didn't taste it myself, but it smelled horrible. Seriously, it smelled like a dirty diaper. I really don't like to waste things, but I felt so badly for my daughter that we threw out the remainder and bought her different vitamins the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Zertuche

customer_reviews.title: Beneficial nutrients & great taste!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff!! My daughter loves the taste!! It's so quick and easy for her to take unlike the chewable or gummy vitamins that taste nasty. I love that it's sugar free & most of all it has all the beneficial nutrients my picky eater doesn't get in her usual diet!
customer_reviews.author: jacqlyn andolfo

customer_reviews.title: Finally
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't get our son to take vitamins until we found this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally able to take vitamins
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had trouble taking any kind of vitamins before using Premium kids. I tried chewables and gummies in different flavors . Now she can't wait to take her vitamin drink everyday. She calls it her orange juice. I would definitely recommend if your child does not like taking a pill or gummy form of vitamin.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Williams

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I purchased this for my 8yr old son and he loves it. I definitely recommend if your child doesn't like to chew vitamins and very picky with eating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting vitamin but it’s easy to spill
customer_reviews.text: Due to my kids’ dental work, we have to stir away from those gummy vitamins and I purchased this based on the good reviews. Both of my kids love the taste of the vitamin, my only thing I spill it a lot as it’s hard to pour it perfectly into a spoon every time. Maybe consider changing the packaging a little so that it’s easy to pour? My kids also wish that you offer different flavor so that there’s a little variety when we purchase. Other than that, they have no complain. We keep this refrigerated by the way.
customer_reviews.author: Tjangdra

customer_reviews.title: Finally found the right vitamins for my child!
customer_reviews.text: After trying (literally) every vitamin type, brand & flavor on the market, this is the one my child will & can take!!! (No gummies, as directed by dentist after 5 cavaties). I am so happy she is getting her vitamins & liking taking them! We usually mix with juice
customer_reviews.author: tts

customer_reviews.title: I  recommend for picky eater
customer_reviews.text: My son is 6 years old and had a very serious eating problem. We went to the doctor and therapist many times on this issue. realy long strory. We have used many different supports to whet your appetite. I have been using it for about 2 months and my son appetite is better than ever. We stopped fighting at every meal.I definitely recommend you to try it.
customer_reviews.author: Y B

customer_reviews.title: Good for my picky eater.
customer_reviews.text: I have been giving this to my daughter for about a year now. I chose it because it's supposed to be better absorbed as opposed to a pill. She is 12 yrs old and drinks it without a fuss. I do like the wide range of ingredients in it. Hopefully it's helping her as she is a very picky eater.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My toddler refused to take vitamins (even gummies). I researched thoroughly and stumbled upon this liquid vitamin and so glad we found it! I've bought multiple bottles and my son loves the taste. We just add it too his juice and no issues. Will continue to purchase from this seller. Quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: 1 drawback
customer_reviews.text: I just want to start off by saying, for the most part, I love these vitamins for my 5 almost 6 year old. But, the reason im writing this review. Is because, I've been buying these vitamins for over a year, and they're not cheap! So, I would expect the packaging to be better. I waste about 6 doses of the vitamins per bottle, because of it leaking out the top of the bottle. If the darn things didn't work so well, I would switch to something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Kids thought it was gross
customer_reviews.text: Kids thought it was gross. Mixed in Orange juice was tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: Mr & Mrs G

customer_reviews.title: Good Liquid Vitamins
customer_reviews.text: Expensive vitamins but a great option for liquid vitamins. My daughter has a hard time chewing vitamins so these are a lifesaver. Its difficult to find liquid vitamins at the store. The ingredients seem good and my daughter enjoys the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking everywhere for a liquid multi vitamin, that's formulated for older kids. My son has a g tube and this vitamin isnt too thick to push thru his tube. I feel so much better, knowing I'm finally able to give him an age appropriate vitamin without clogging his tube. It looks, smells and tastes like orange juice so if you have picky kids, I can't imagine having any trouble getting them to take it either. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Leana Blackman

customer_reviews.title: Taste great
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves this and that saying a lot. He is really picky. With bad teeth he can’t have gummy vitamins so this was our only choice.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My son doesn't want to swallow pills and I don't like the gummies getting stuck in his teeth. This vitamin is perfect! I put it in apple juice and he doesn't notice at all!
customer_reviews.author: The Kahls

customer_reviews.title: great taste
customer_reviews.text: Don't have to force her to take it and doesn't taste nasty. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Liquid Vitamins for my kiddos!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first liquid vitamins my kiddos have tried and they all love it!! We are almost finished with our first bottle and everyone seems to be doing great with the flavor and feeling better. We just ordered 3 more bottles. Kids are 4, 11, and 13 and they all approve.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy from Atlanta

customer_reviews.title: Beware - possibly allergic reaction itching rash
customer_reviews.text: My kid starts having itchy rash allergies after 2 week of taking this , can’t return, can’t have my money back :/ disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Luv2Shop

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product to other parents.
customer_reviews.text: My 6year old has SPD and struggled to get all the nutrients he needs. I put this in his drink first thing in the morning and he drinks it down, never giving me any trouble! He won’t eat gummies or other forms of vitamins so this is a great alternative! I am happy I found it and would recommend to other parents.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hess

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It is versatile for sure. I can give to my son by spoon or mix it in his drink. Lately though he doesn’t like the spoon way, so I have been putting it in his drink.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn C

customer_reviews.title: methylated b vitamins
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good, my son has no problem taking it (I mix it in some apple juice.) We need methlyated b vitamins and I had to search to find a liquid children's multi with it. Glad I found this.
customer_reviews.author: mbsm

customer_reviews.title: My daughter likes it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because my daughter just got braces. She doesn't like swallowing pills, gummies are too sticky, and the chewables are too hard. We weren't sure how well it would go over, but we were pleasantly surprised. She likes the taste well enough (to me it smells like the Flintstones vitamins I used to take when I was a kid). She even reminds ME when it's time to take her vitamins. We've finished the first bottle and purchased a second. Win Win for us all around.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Byrnes

customer_reviews.title: Daughter hates the flavor
customer_reviews.text: Argh!! We cannot figure out how to give this to her without her spitting it out. She hates the flavor. Can’t take it straight or in her water...we’re still going to try to put it in her oatmeal. Fingers crossed. I wanted her to like it because she needs the Vitamin A (won’t eat ANY orange vegetables), but it’s not looking good.
customer_reviews.author: Babymama17

customer_reviews.title: Children's liquid multivitamin.
customer_reviews.text: My wife give this to my 12yr old daughter and 4yr old son everyday and they seem to like it.
customer_reviews.author: ONeil Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great value and no mess!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my daughter as she is 7 and just fitted for braces. Gummy and chewable vitamins are not recommended by our orthodontist. I tried another brand first and found that it tasted ok, but had a very gross vitamin smell which turned my daughter off. It also was very sticky and messy. The Tropical Oasis brand doesn't have as much of an odor, it tastes great, is less messy and comes in a bigger bottle for the money. We will keep using it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Flaherty

customer_reviews.title: The only liquid multivitamin that our son will take...
customer_reviews.text: This is the only multivitamin we can get our autistic 6 year old to take, he is such a picky eater and needs a little extra in the vitamin category. We put a little in his drinks at a time and he never complains.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: My kids have been taking this liquid vitiman for over 3 years daily. Each and every bottle has been the same (consistency) and the spread of vitamins and minerals meets our needs. Will continue to give to my kids and recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas J Batch

customer_reviews.title: Great vitamin for toddlers that can't take gummies or chewables.
customer_reviews.text: Researched for liquid children's vitamins before ordering this.Checked stores and Vitamin shops and couldn't find a citrus flavored one for toddlers.Headed online and ended up chosing this one. The kids love it.My 4 yr. old grandson has sensory disorder and the taste and texture were perfect for him. Just like no pulp orange juice.Smells good.Three year old granddaughter begs for more.I am very pleased with the product.Great for picky eaters to get what they need to stay healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon I.

customer_reviews.title: Great taste !
customer_reviews.text: My very difficult four year old took this liquid with little fighting. I would like to call it a miracle but this honestly is the best tasting option I’ve found in a child’s multivitamin
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: Tasty vitamins
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this vitamin, I have to physically stop them otherwise they'll gulp down the whole bottle.
customer_reviews.author: ajs

customer_reviews.title: Must be placed in the fridge after opening
customer_reviews.text: does not have a bad taste. My kids love this. I see an increase in my kids appetite and more energy.
customer_reviews.author: Tawauna Gill

customer_reviews.title: My kids will actually drink it
customer_reviews.text: We decided to get a liquid vitamin for one of our sons who has some food sensitivities so doesn't have a very large range of the types of food that he will eat. Both of my 5 year old boys will actually drink these vitamins. Yes - it has a bit of that B vitamin complex after-taste but it really isn't all that bad tasting. We call it vitamin juice. We're almost through the first bottle and so far so good. We're looking at getting the trace minerals product as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I put it in my kids juice with elderberry and DHA oils and they never know! So much better than gummies, my kids barely chew them so I know they do not get absorbed like a liquid is.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: My kids love these vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: I learned from my children's dentist that gummy vitamins are terrible for kid's teeth. Now I give my kids liquid vitamins each morning and they love it! I have a 4 year old and 8 year old and they both remind me to give them their vitamins each morning since they love the taste. They actually call it their "citrus cooler". I love that they are regularly getting their vitamins and aren't having sugary gummies wrecking their teeth each day. I set up these vitamins on a subscription so I don't even have to think about it. Great product that is kid approved!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn George

customer_reviews.title: Great multivitamin for kids
customer_reviews.text: Thank you fast delivery. My son is picky and won’t take any gummies or pills. I mix this with my sons pediasure in the morning and he gets all nutrients without even noticing it.
customer_reviews.author: Luciana Lima

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my daughter and of course I had to taste test myself. It tastes good on its own, but can also be added to juice and it isn't noticeable. My daughter takes this daily and she likes it. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: OG

customer_reviews.title: It help build my daughter appetite
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. I've been looking for a vitamin for quite some time and this has to be the best. It built my daughter appetite instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Shawanda

customer_reviews.title: great nutrition and great taste.
customer_reviews.text: Our "picky" eater recently got an expander to help straighten her teeth. I was concerned about her nutrition as eating is an issue with this new appliance in her mouth and she can no longer eat the gummy vitamins. These liquid vitamins were the perfect answer to my concerns. She LIKES THE TASTE and I am satisfied she is getting the nutrition she needs! Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Diane French

customer_reviews.title: So easy to take!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter did not like any of the chewable vitamins, so we tried this liquid one. She loved it! Never gives us an issue drinking it all, and she even reminds us if we forget to give it to her! She said it tastes like orange juice. This is a life saver as she is a picky eater and doesn’t get everything she needs out of foods. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids w/ braces!
customer_reviews.text: My son got braces and couldn’t take his gummy vitamins and airborne C. So I started looking for a product to use. We keep it chilled and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Aroot

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: My son would not eat gummy vitamins so I bought this and waterboarded him with it. Now he eats gummy vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my picky toddler and  4 year old.
customer_reviews.text: I know that the product states ages 4 and up but we have an extremely picky toddler who wasn't eating with much variety and also a 4 year old who was the same. I looked online and found this vitamin with great reviews! My children take the dosage for their weight each morning with a little bit of juice and they love it. I am happy to know that they are receiving the vitamins that they need.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Tastes fine but does not have a child proof cap
customer_reviews.text: The liquid tastes like an orange juice concentrate so I mixed it with some orange juice for my 6-year old. She did not even notice it. However, please be aware that it does not come with a child proof cap in case you need that at your house.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Yuen

customer_reviews.title: My son likes it
customer_reviews.text: My son had been taking this for about three years and he loves the flavor mixed with orange juice and what can I say I hope it’s helping .. he’s a picky eater so I’m always scared he doesn’t have enough vitamins ... will continue to purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Tips
customer_reviews.text: I prefer a more organic sweetener like monk fruit or stevia. Please add trace minerals Mu children love the taste
customer_reviews.author: CBrennan

customer_reviews.title: Great kid's vitamin
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a good, liquid vitamin for my daughter for a while. I have been so disappointed by how much sugar is in children's products (like really disappointed). I was SO happy to see this vitamin didn't have added sugars! It's got all of what she needs and none of what she doesn't. I am fan for life! I am thinking I'll even try the men's version for my husband! :)
customer_reviews.author: F. Gove

customer_reviews.title: Tastes fine to my picky toddler!
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time ordering it. My 4yo is very picky and she drinks this with no hesitation. Seems to build her immune up bc she hasn't gotten sick lately. Happy mom!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Coulanges

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous! I have bought and thrown away so many vitamins because the kids hate the taste. Not this one! They remind me to take it because they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is disgusting nasty tasting
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my granddaughter as the label assures GREAT TASTE. She just got braces and can't chew the gummies she is used to taking. I am soooooo disappointed in the misrepresentation of this product. $23 just wasted right here at Christmas. The smell is overwhelming as soon as you open it. You want to gag just with the scent!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Fleming

customer_reviews.title: My Daughter Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has never enjoyed the gummy or pill vitamins, so I decided to switch to a liquid form. She absolutely loves the taste (tells me it reminds her of orange juice) and she takes it every morning with no complaint. I also feel like she has more energy since she started taking it. Will totally buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon K

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many different brands of Children's multivitamins it's ridiculous. Every single one my 8yr old twins refused to take them because of the taste or texture. I started taking the Tropical Oasis Women's multivitamin & loved it so I thought I would try one more time with the kids & to my amazement they loved it. They don't complain or refuse to take it every day & I will continue to buy this product for them.
customer_reviews.author: Recon Refractory & Construction

product_meta.title: Premium Kids Liquid Multivitamin & Superfood -100% DV of 14 Vitamins for Kids. Multi-Vitamin for Children Ages 4+. Great Tasting, Non-GMO, No Sugar - Max Absorption - 16 oz, 32 Serv
feature_bullets: 💛 GREAT TASTING KIDS LIQUID MULTIVITAMIN- No more chasing your kids around to take nasty tasting vitamins. Your kids will love the taste of our multivitamin while getting the essential daily nutrients they need. FOR AGES 4 & UP!
💯 EACH DOSE CONTAINS 100% DAILY VALUE OF ESSENTIAL VITAMINS FOR KIDS- Each dose contains the essential nutrients needed for your child while supporting a healthy immune system.

📈 5X HIGHER ABSORPTION RATE VS PILLS OR GUMMIES: Liquid Vitamins go straight into your bloodstream and therefore are absorbed between 95-98% by the body. PIlls & Gummies need be digested first, and are only absorbed between 3-18% percent. So stop wasting your money on inferior products, and give liquid vitamins a chance
✅ NON GMO, GLUTEN & FRUCTOSE FREE - Our Children’s Multivitamin does not contain any preservatives, gluten, artificial flavoring, artificial coloring OR additives
🏆 QUALITY YOU CAN TRUST: 100% 30 Day Money Back Guarantee – MADE IN THE USA in GMP Certified Facility – 30 Day Supply
